name: Caveman Chili
author: Maverick259
summary: Low-carb chili made in the slow cooker.
ingredients: 1 (1.25 ounce) package chili seasoning (such as McCormick®)
1 pinch garlic powder, or more to taste
1 pinch onion powder, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch ground cayenne pepper, or more to taste
directions: Place pork in a skillet over medium heat; season with salt and pepper
Cook and stir until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Transfer pork to a slow cooker
Place bacon in the hot skillet and cook over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Transfer bacon to the slow cooker
Combine drained tomatoes, onion, green bell pepper, and tomato paste into the slow cooker
Add seasoning packet, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt, pepper, cayenne pepper; stir to combine
Cook on Low until flavors have combined, about 6 hours
